infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to allow taking pictures.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone to allow audio recording.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library so you can select and upload images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to save images to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to display relevant nearby content.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app may use your location to provide continuous location-based features.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your contacts to connect with other users.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your calendars to manage events.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to reminders to keep tasks synced.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app needs access to Bluetooth to connect to nearby devices.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs Bluetooth permission to maintain connectivity with accessories.
infoPlist.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This app needs access to devices on your local network.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app uses Face ID to securely authenticate your identity.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app uses tracking data to provide a better personalized experience.
infoPlist.NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription: This app needs access to your documents to upload files.
